name: Magic bar charts with auto resizing
description:
Here is a magic way to design a chart with auto resizing in figma.


  • The width of the bar can be adjusted freely by dragging and keeping the proportional zoom
  • The position of the bar can be adjusted up and down by pressing the arrow keys on the keyboard
  • The number of bars can be increased/decreased
  • The thickness and rounded corners of the bars can be adjusted in batches after frame selection


Duplicate and check out how I play with it ;)
